VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing CrimsonLink relative to AetherNet?
SRP.A: CrimsonLink is {below} AetherNet in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total subscription revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total subscription revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {CrimsonLink}.

VE.Q: What is CrimsonLink's Subscription Revenue in 1961?
What is CrimsonLink's Subscription Revenue in 1964?
What is Starburst Online's Subscription Revenue in 1973?
VE.A: Starburst Online's subscription revenue in 1973 is {754635825.14} $.

VE.Q: What are the subscription revenue of EchoWave, Starburst Online, and CrimsonLink in 1968?
VE.A: EchoWave's subscription revenue is {146220867.08} $, Starburst Online's subscription revenue is {469660395.94} $, CrimsonLink's subscription revenue is {144599347.75} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Subscription Revenue in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum subscription revenue is {52200507.78} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Subscription Revenue in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum subscription revenue is {1483663632.39} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Subscription Revenue level recorded for AetherNet?

SC.Q: What is the average total Subscription Revenue?
SC.A: The average total subscription revenue is {1796438754.12} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Subscription Revenue fall between 1661950672.27 and 1836892848.29 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Subscription Revenue go below 1486644488.98 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Subscription Revenue exceed 2012199031.58 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Subscription Revenue in 1961 higher or lower than in 1965?
NC.A: The total subscription revenue in 1961 was {lower} than in 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1976, was the average total Subscription Revenue higher or lower than between 1961 and 1966?
NC.A: The average total subscription revenue between 1965 and 1976 was {higher} than between 1961 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1975, was the average total Subscription Revenue higher or lower than between 1966 and 1967?
NC.A: The average total subscription revenue between 1973 and 1975 was {higher} than between 1966 and 1967.

NC.Q: Was the total Subscription Revenue in 1961 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total subscription revenue in 1961 was {lower} than in 1979.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Starburst Online} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {CrimsonLink, EchoWave, Luminara, OracleFeed, AetherNet, Starburst Online}.
